oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The International Bibliography of Communist Studies. Books on Communism, Issue 2017/18
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Albert, Gleb J.
Bayerlein, Bernhard H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1367 books from 54 countries have been retrieved for the 2017–2018 issue of the International Bibliography, also including selected addenda from 2015–2016.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: The International Newsletter of Communist Studies; Vol 24/25, No 31-32 (2018/2019); 227-300
